H0.text: Time is what a light year is used to measure.

H1.text: Distance is what a light year is used to measure.

H2.text: Luminosity is measured using a light year.

H3.text: Temperature is what a light year is used to measure.

A4.text: a light-year is a unit of length used to express astronomical distances

A5.text: the term should not be misinterpreted as a unit of time
